text: Martin Jære (9 January 1920 - 18 December 2015)Martin Jære's obituary was a Norwegian skier from Oppdal. He competed in cross-country skiing at the 1948 Winter Olympics, where he placed 10th in 50 km. ==Cross-country skiing results== ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text- align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 18 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1948 || 28 || — || 10 || — |- |} ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Oppdal Category:Norwegian male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Norway Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics
title: Martin Jære
